description: Triangular numbers with all digits the same.
references: D. Ballew and R. Weger, Repdigit triangular numbers, J. Rec. Math. Vol. 8(2), p. 96, 1975-76.
L. E. Dickson, History of the Theory of Numbers, Vol. II, p. 33, Chelsea NY, 1952.
E. B. Escott, Math. Quest. Educational Times, (2) 8 (1905), 33-34. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 31 2014
crossrefs: Cf. A213516 (triangular numbers having only 1 or 2 different digits).
author: _Felice Russo_
